name: SKLightNode
desc: A node that lights surrounding nodes.

items.name: var isEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the node is casting light.

items.name: var categoryBitMask: UInt32
items.desc: A mask that defines which categories this light belongs to.

items.name: var ambientColor: UIColor
items.desc: The ambient color of the light.

items.name: var lightColor: UIColor
items.desc: The diffuse and specular color of the light source.

items.name: var shadowColor: UIColor
items.desc: The color of any shadow cast by a sprite.

items.name: var falloff: CGFloat
items.desc: The exponent for the rate of decay of the light source.
